content: mosaic christmas cal part 10 overlay mosaic crochet in row | us terminology mosaic crochet chart & written pattern © bebablanket 2022 https //bebablanket com/ mosaic christmas cal part 10 of mosaic christmas cal hosted by mosaic crochet group on facebook https //www facebook com/groups/mosaiccrochet designers from all over the world have joined this collaboration and we are happy to share these gorgeous patterns with you welcome to join us experience level advanced beginner language & terminology english us technique overlay mosaic crochet in row pattern repeat 24x2+3 pattern file size 8 pages the pattern includes ● links to introductory information about mosaic crochet basics and video tutorials ● chart with marked xs ● written pattern ● video tutorial https //youtu be/mtyuthsgdoq ● detailed information about yarn amounts used for the design ● layout using this design only stitches & abbreviations chain/chs chain/chains st/sts stitch/stitches r/rs row/row stsc standing single_crochet single_crochet single crochet blsc back loop single_crochet bl back loop fldc front loop double_crochet if you are using my double border easy start three magic steps technique to make a double border around your project the first - border b stitch st on every row r is always a standing center single_crochet stcsc the last - border b stitch st on every row r is always a center single_crochet csc you will find more information in the file double border easy start three magic steps see the paragraph mosaic crochet basics & useful links mosaic crochet basics & useful links ● if you are new to overlay mosaic crochet and need help in understanding and reading charts this video tutorial might be helpful https //youtu be/dijbqrrl99o ● a written guide of the overlay mosaic crochet basics plus bonus pattern booming mosaic https //ravel me/booming-mosaic ● important if you plan to work a double border read the instructions and watch the video tutorial double border easy start three magic steps before you start your project https //ravel me/double-border-easy-start-three-magic-steps https //youtu be/mctybkni1p0 ● more useful links https //bebablanket com/useful-links yarn hook & approximate pattern sample size yarn weight #3 light/dk hook size clover amour 4 mm g background color a hobbii we love yarn white 1 yarn pattern color b hobbii colorina 01 sample size shape & amount of rectangle width 24 5 cm/ 9 6 in height 14 cm/5 5 in yarn width 1 repeat/48+3 sts x color a 17 g 51 m / 56 yds height 1 repeat color b 8 g 32 m / 35 yds you can use any yarn colors & appropriate hook size that suits your project overlay mosaic crochet pattern mosaic christmas cal part 10| © bebablanket 2022 page 2 of 8 let s start if this is the first part for your project start with a foundation cord as described below and work r1 in your background color if this is not the first part of your project follow the written pattern on p 5 or chart on p 4 starting with r2 please
